trans-unit.source: Describes a color in terms of alpha, red, green, and blue channels.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver en farge i form alfa, røde, grønne og blå kanaler.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *predefinedColor* One of the colors predefined by the class.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML verdier *predefinedColor* en av fargene forhåndsdefinert klasse.

trans-unit.source: *rgb* A three-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: *RGB* tresifret heksadesimale tall.

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Det første sifferet angir fargen på <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>verdien angir andre siffer i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>verdien og tredje siffer angir det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `00F`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `00F`.

trans-unit.source: *argb* A four-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: *ARGB* firesifret heksadesimale tall.

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Første siffer angir fargen på <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>verdi andre siffer angir det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>verdi neste sifre angir det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>verdi, og det siste sifferet angir det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `F00F`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `F00F`.

trans-unit.source: *rrggbb* A six-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: *rrggbb* sekssifret heksadesimale tall.

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: De første to sifrene angir du fargen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>verdi de neste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>verdi, og de siste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *aarrggbb* An eight-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: *aarrggbb* en åtte heksadesimalt siffer.

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: De første to sifrene angir du fargen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>verdi de neste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>verdi de neste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>verdi, og de siste to angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `FF0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `FF0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *scA* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: *scA* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> for fargen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *scR* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: *scR* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> for fargen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *scG* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: *scG* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> for fargen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *scB* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: *scB* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> for fargen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] eller [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] farge profilen.</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The alpha channel color value.
trans-unit.target: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> alfa kanal fargeverdien.</xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0.0 to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er mellom 0,0 til 1,0.

trans-unit.source: *colorValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
trans-unit.target: *colorValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> en kommadelt liste med tre til åtte verdier som representerer fargekanaler for profilen.</xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0.0 to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er mellom 0,0 til 1,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> alpha channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> alfa kanalverdien av farge.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure determines the amount of transparency the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> has.
trans-unit.target: Alfa kanalen for en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturen bestemmer mengden gjennomsiktighet i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>har.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 255 indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: En alfaverdi 255 angir den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>fullstendig ugjennomsiktig og verdien 0 angir fargen er helt gjennomsiktig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (A, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the ScRGB channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: Den `sRGB` kanaler (A, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) og Modellprofil kanaler (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturen er synkronisert egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when A, the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel, når en, `sRGB` alfa kanal er endret, den `ScRGB` alfa kanal <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, konverteres til tilsvarende verdien 0-1 område som den `Sc` sikkerhetsopplegg støtter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> alpha channel value of the color, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> alfa kanalverdien fargen, en verdi mellom 0 og 255.

trans-unit.source: Adds two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Legger til to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturer legges sammen ved å legge til alfa, røde, grønne og blå kanaler for den første fargen alfa, røde, grønne og blå kanaler for den andre fargen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel alfa kanalen for `color1` og alfa kanalen for `color2` er lagt til å produsere alfa kanalen for den resulterende fargen.

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.
trans-unit.target: Det samme er ferdig med rødt, grønne og blå kanaler til å produsere røde, grønne og blå kanaler for den nye fargen.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: Andre <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure whose color values are the results of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen der verdiene er resultatet av tillegg-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structures for fuzzy equality.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturer Vedlikehold likhet.

trans-unit.source: This equality method compensates for the fact that floating-point values can acquire a small amount of error when operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden for likhet kompenserer for faktumet at flyttall verdier kan hente litt feil under styrt av.

trans-unit.source: The first color to compare.
trans-unit.target: Første fargen som skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: The second color to compare.
trans-unit.target: Andre fargen som skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: if color1 and color2 are nearly identical; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if color1 and color2 are nearly identical; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> blue channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> blå kanalverdien av farge.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, B) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: Den `sRGB` kanaler (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, B) og `ScRGB` kanaler (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturen er synkronisert egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when B, the `sRGB` blue channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` blue channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når B, den `sRGB` blå kanal, er endret, den `ScRGB` blå kanalen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>, konverteres til tilsvarende verdien 0-1 område som den `Sc` sikkerhetsopplegg støtter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> blue channel value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> blå kanalverdien for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur, en verdi mellom 0 og 255.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScRGB" name="ScRGB" href=""></xref> channels of the color to within the gamut of 0 to 1, if they are outside that range.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScRGB" name="ScRGB" href=""> </xref> kanaler for fargen som skal i skala på 0 til 1, hvis de er utenfor området.

trans-unit.source: The gamut of the `ScRGB` color space is larger than the clamp range, so the use of this method may result in the loss of color information.
trans-unit.target: Skalaen for den `ScRGB` fargeområde er større enn clamp-området slik bruk av denne metoden kan føre til tap av fargeinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile of the color.
trans-unit.target: Henter den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] eller [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] farge profilen av farge.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] eller [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] profilen inneholder en farge system-profil for et bestemt program eller enhet som en fargeskriver.

trans-unit.source: This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne profilen er tilordnet en fellesprofilen som i sin tur kan tilordnes til individuelle profilene til andre enheter.

trans-unit.source: This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at fargesystemet som enhet for én datamaskin som samsvarer med fargene fra andre programmer og enheter på samme eller andre systemer.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile of the color.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] eller [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] farge profilen av farge.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure and is equivalent to this color.
trans-unit.target: Tester om det angitte objektet er en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur og tilsvarer denne fargen.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Flyttall verdier kan hente lavt visse feil når de styrt av.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>-metoden i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A>operatoren, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A>operatoren ikke kompenserer for dette, og derfor kan ikke returnere forventet boolsk resultat.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>metoden bruker en algoritme for tabellvedlikehold likhet som kompenserer for flyttall aritmetisk feilen ved å returnere `true` en sammenligning av to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturer som er nesten identiske, men med verdier kan variere minuscule datamengden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å sammenligne dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure and is identical to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det angitte objektet er en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur og er identisk med gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure is identical to this color.
trans-unit.target: Tester om den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> er identisk med denne fargen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen til å sammenligne gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> er identisk med gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Tester om to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturer er identiske.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Flyttall verdier kan hente lavt visse feil når de styrt av.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>-metoden i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A>operatoren, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A>operatoren ikke kompenserer for dette, og derfor kan ikke returnere forventet boolsk resultat.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>metoden bruker en algoritme for tabellvedlikehold likhet som kompenserer for flyttall aritmetisk feilen ved å returnere `true` en sammenligning av to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturer som er nesten identiske, men med verdier kan variere minuscule datamengden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a color determines the amount of transparency of the color.
trans-unit.target: Alfa kanalen for en farge som bestemmer mengden gjennomsiktighet av farge.

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 255 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: En alfaverdi 255 indikerer at fargen er helt ugjennomsiktig, og verdien 0 indikerer at fargen er helt gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] eller [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] profilen inneholder en farge system-profil for et bestemt program eller enhet som en fargeskriver.

trans-unit.source: This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne profilen er tilordnet en fellesprofilen som i sin tur kan tilordnes til individuelle profilene til andre enheter.

trans-unit.source: This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at fargesystemet som enhet for én datamaskin som samsvarer med fargene fra andre programmer og enheter på samme eller andre systemer.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, the sRGB red channel, is modified the ScRGB red channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, is transformed to the equivalent value.

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> grønn kanalverdien av farge.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, G, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: Den `sRGB` kanaler (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, G, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) og `ScRGB` kanaler (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturen er synkronisert egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when G, the `sRGB` green channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` green channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når G, den `sRGB` grønn kanal, er endret, den `ScRGB` grønne kanalen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, konverteres til tilsvarende verdien 0-1 område som den `Sc` sikkerhetsopplegg støtter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> grønn kanalverdien for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur, en verdi mellom 0 og 255.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color channel values of the color.
trans-unit.target: Henter kanalverdiene av farge.

trans-unit.source: An array of color channel values.
trans-unit.target: En matrise for kanal.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the alpha, red, blue, and green channels of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure by the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Multipliserer alfa, røde, blå og grønne kanaler for det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen av den angitte verdien.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> to be multiplied.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> skal multipliseres med.

trans-unit.source: The value to multiply by.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for å multiplisere med.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure whose color values are the results of the multiplication operation.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen der verdiene er resultatet av Multiplikasjonsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Adds two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Legger til to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturer legges sammen ved å legge til alfa, røde, grønne og blå kanaler for den første fargen alfa, røde, grønne og blå kanaler for den andre fargen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel alfa kanalen for `color1` og alfa kanalen for `color2` er lagt til å produsere alfa kanalen for den resulterende fargen.

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.
trans-unit.target: Det samme er ferdig med rødt, grønne og blå kanaler til å produsere røde, grønne og blå kanaler for den nye fargen.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: Andre <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure whose color values are the results of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen der verdiene er resultatet av tillegg-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structures are identical.
trans-unit.target: Tester om to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturer er identiske.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Flyttall verdier kan hente lavt visse feil når de styrt av.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the Equality operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>metoden, operatoren likhet og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A>operatoren ikke kompenserer for dette, og derfor kan ikke returnere forventet boolsk resultat.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>metoden bruker en algoritme for tabellvedlikehold likhet som kompenserer for flyttall aritmetisk feilen ved å returnere `true` en sammenligning av to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturer som er nesten identiske, men med verdier kan variere minuscule datamengden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen til å sammenligne.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: Andre <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen til å sammenligne.

trans-unit.source: if color1 and color2 are exactly identical; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if color1 and color2 are exactly identical; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structures are not identical.
trans-unit.target: Tester om to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturer er ikke identiske.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Flyttall verdier kan hente lavt visse feil når de styrt av.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the Inequality operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: Det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>-metoden i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A>operatoren, operatoren ulikhet ikke kompenserer for dette og dermed kan ikke returnere forventet boolsk resultat.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>metoden bruker en algoritme for tabellvedlikehold likhet som kompenserer for flyttall aritmetisk feilen ved å returnere `true` en sammenligning av to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturer som er nesten identiske, men med verdier kan variere minuscule datamengden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>

trans-unit.target: Andre <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen til å sammenligne.

trans-unit.target: Verdien for å multiplisere med.

trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen der verdiene er resultatet av Multiplikasjonsoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure from a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Trekker en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur fra en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are subtracted from one another by subtracting the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color from the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturer trekkes fra hverandre ved å trekke alfa, røde, grønne og blå kanaler for den andre fargen fra alfa, røde, grønne og blå kanaler for den første fargen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color2` is subtracted from the alpha channel of `color1` to produce the alpha channel of the resulting <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel alfa kanalen for `color2` trekkes fra alfa kanalen for `color1` til å produsere alfa kanalen for den resulterende <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure.
trans-unit.target: Det samme er ferdig med rødt, grønne og blå kanaler til å produsere røde, grønne og blå kanaler for det nye <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen skal trekkes fra.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to subtract from `color1`.

trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> strukturen der verdiene er resultatet av operasjonen subtraksjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> red channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> røde kanalverdien av farge.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, R, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: Den `sRGB` kanaler (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, R, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) og `ScRGB` kanaler (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturen er synkronisert egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when R, the `sRGB` red channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` red channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når R, den `sRGB` røde kanalen er endret, den `ScRGB` røde kanalen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, konverteres til tilsvarende verdien 0-1 område som den `Sc` sikkerhetsopplegg støtter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> red channel value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> røde kanalverdien for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur, en verdi mellom 0 og 255.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScRGB" name="ScRGB" href=""></xref> alpha channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScRGB" name="ScRGB" href=""> </xref> alfa kanalverdien av farge.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure determines the amount of transparency the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> has.
trans-unit.target: Alfa kanalen for en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturen bestemmer mengden gjennomsiktighet i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>har.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 1 indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: En Alfa verdien-1 indikerer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>fullstendig ugjennomsiktig og verdien 0 angir fargen er helt gjennomsiktig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (ScA, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: Den `sRGB` kanaler (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) og `ScRGB` kanaler (ScA, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>strukturen er synkronisert egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, ScAis converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, `sRGB` alfa kanal er endret, den `ScRGB` alfa kanal, ScAis konverteres til den tilsvarende verdien med 0-1 område som den `Sc` sikkerhetsopplegg støtter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScRGB" name="ScRGB" href=""> </xref> alfa kanalverdien for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> struktur, en verdi mellom 0 og 1.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation represents the <xref:System.Byte> values in hex form, prefixes with the `#` character, and starts with the alpha channel.
